name: Contaminate
description:
This is just a little game i’ve worked on for 3-4 months now

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Z or E to interact

You are Tillis, A scientist in a subterranean laboratory

One night the power goes out and You’re locked in

Unfortunately your newest specimens have not been properly contained

The specimens do not care for you

But do not stand in their way if you want to keep breathing.

So the goal is to get the power back on, get to the exit and make it out alive
